  • Method Details

    • loadDataPack

      DataPack loadDataPack (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Loads the passed player's data pack. If not found, a new data pack module is created. (CAN RETURN NULL)
      Parameters:
      player - The player to load the data pack for.

    • cleanUpDataPacks

      void cleanUpDataPacks()
      Attempts to remove any player data from the database when the player's last seen exceeds one year.

    • getShopRayTraced

      Shop getShopRayTraced (@NotNull @NotNull String worldName, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.util.Vector eyeVector, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.util.Vector directionVector, double distance)
      Ray traces from the provided vectors to obtain a shop from the locations it passes through.
      Parameters:
      worldName - The world to ray trace in.
      eyeVector - The eye location of the entity or just the general origin location.
      directionVector - The direction at which the vector should go.
      distance - The distance at which the ray should travel.
      Returns:
      The found shop, returns NULL if NOT found.

    • initiateShopEconomyTransaction

      EconomyCallEvent initiateShopEconomyTransaction (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player investor, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer producer, @NotNull @NotNull Shop shop, @NotNull @NotNull EconomyCallType economyCallType, double price)
      Initiates a withdraw/deposit transaction directed at an investor and owner automating messages, taxing, and more (The stopInTacks() method must be called still).
      Parameters:
      investor - The buyer.
      producer - The seller.
      shop - The shop in use.
      economyCallType - The economy type being processed Buy, Sell, etc.
      price - The price in use.
      Returns:
      the economy call event

    • initiateChatInteractionOperation

      boolean initiateChatInteractionOperation (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull ChatInteractionType chatInteractionType, @NotNull @NotNull String playerEntryValue)
      Runs the chat interaction operation as normal using the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      player - The player of who is in the chat interaction.
      playerEntryValue - The value/message the player entered.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the interaction completes successfully; otherwise, the return is false.

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull String message)
      Sends a color translated message to the players as either a normal chat message or action bar message.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to send the message to.
      message - The message to send (color codes accepted, if the message contains {bar} at the front it will be sent to the action bar).

    • getInventorySpaceForItem

      int getInventorySpaceForItem (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
      Obtains available space for a defined item.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who's inventory needs to be checked.
      itemStack - The itemstack to check for.
      Returns:
      The total available item amount space.

      Returns:

    • createShop

      Shop createShop (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.block.Block block, int shopItemAmount, boolean doCreationEffects, boolean sendCreationMessage)
      Creates a shop at the passed block owned by the passed player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to use as the owner.
      block - The block to create the shop at.
      shopItemAmount - The amount used for the shop item.
      doCreationEffects - Whether to play the effects and sounds.
      sendCreationMessage - Whether to send the creation message.
      Returns:
      The shop object.

    • loadShops

      void loadShops (boolean isAsync, boolean cleanUp)
      Attempts to load all available shops from the database.
      Parameters:
      isAsync - Whether the task is ran on the main thread.
      cleanUp - Deletes all shops that have invalid data (Example: No longer existing worlds).

    • getMaxStock

      int getMaxStock (@NotNull @NotNull Shop shop)
      Obtains the passed shop's max stock based on owner permissions or administrator bypasses.
      Parameters:
      shop - The shop to get the max stock for (obtains owner for permissions, returns max possible integer if the shop is admin or the owner has the "displayshops.stock.max").
      Returns:
      The obtained max stock (defaults to configuration value or max possible integer, if the shop is admin).

      Parameters:
